txt.en: Now that you've learned a bit about Item Advancement, you're ready to try your hand at some of the more advanced aspects. This quest covers Deconstruction and Slotting Runics.
In order to improve your precious advanceable item, you'll want to kill his brethren and use their parts to make him the wonderfulest item ever.
Take the runic that you've removed from an advanceable item and apply it to eq_ia_test.wc.
